channel.title: Projects on SerializingMe
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on SerializingMe

item.title: GPO Bypass
item.description: This utility allows you to bypass Group Policy enforced controls on Firefox (as an example), especifically, it allows you to still install add-ons even if disabled through GPOs. This tool only supports 64 bit versions of Firefox.

item.title: Malware Classification
item.description: Malware Classification is a workflow that makes use of Machine Learning to classify unknown Windows Portable Executable files.

item.title: HPQPswdD
item.description: Small utility that can be used to decrypt HPQPswd encrypted passwords.

item.title: PowaScripts
item.description: Collection of PowerShell scripts used for incident response, reconnaissance, etc.

item.title: TQ-Invincible
item.description: Library that makes the player character invulnerable to attack in THQ 2006 role playing game, Titan Quest.

item.title: Emofishes
item.description: Collection of proof of concepts that help improve, bypass or detect virtualized malware execution environments.
